title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
hi guys this time i have this board with no power, some corrosion around ISL and U7400 area, after clean the pcb and replace isl i got green/orange light on charger but no fan spin

some measures

PPBUS_G3H 8.60v
PP3V42_G3H. 3.4V
PP5V_S5          5V
PP3V3_S5.     3.3V
PP5V_S4RS3.    5V


with thermal cam i see U3900 and U2800 a little hot

any suggestion?

title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
If you get 5V at L7520, there should be voltage on other coils too; check them all.

ALL_SYS_PWRGD is high?
Inspect Q8150 and U1950 for corrosion.

title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
no corrosion, Q8150 and U1950 replaced, measures

L7130.   8.59V
L7520.    5.1V
L7560.    3.3V
L7430.    0.11V
L7630.     1.05V
L7310.      0V
L7320.      0V

ALL_SYS_PWRGGD    0.6V

what about U3900 and U2800 a little hot with thermal cam

title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
"L7430.    0.11V"
Check diode mode to ground first.
If good, post U7400 voltages; pins 6, 12, 16, 17.

title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
Diode mode on L7430 = 0.165

u7400
pin 6.  0.07V
pin 12.  5v
pin 16.  3v
pin 17. 0.35v

title: 820-00165  No Power
message: already replaced two times, same result

title: 820-00165  No Power
message:
Check diode mode to ground at pin 6.
Also check all traces and surrounding components.
Just in case, replace R/C7425.
